Now let me identify and fix the two main issues:

Issue 1: AudioContext Suspension
The "AudioContext was not allowed to start" error occurs because modern browsers require a user gesture to start audio playback due to autoplay policies. The audio system needs to properly handle this.

Issue 2: Sound Asset Loading
The "SOUND_LOAD_ERROR: Sound asset not found" error suggests the audio system is trying to load sounds before the AudioContext is properly resumed.
